1.text: ●Scene: Questioning Isk at the Headless Beauty Inn

5.name: Sol
5.text:
"I-Isk-san was, w-w-with that adventurer... t-they
were... p-partners!?"

6.name: Sol
6.text:
"L-l-last night, I saw Isk-san and a male
adventurer... mating...!"

8.name: Isk
8.text:
"That was... because I had lent my power to that
gentleman... the power of the dragon..."

9.name: Isk
9.text:
"Sol-sama... are you familiar with the ritual of
the Dragonkind...?"

11.name: Isk
11.text:
"Yes... Have you not heard of such stories? Heroes
who bathed in the blood of dragons and gained
bodies of steel, heroes who consumed dragon flesh
and became immortal, heroes who drank the living
blood of dragons and obtained fearsome power...
Ah, how precious..."

12.name: Isk
12.text:
"Like the heroes in the stories, it is a ritual
where we dragons bestow power upon the chosen
hero..."

13.name: Isk
13.text:
"The dragon desiring the ritual takes on human
form and forms a bond with the desired hero for
one night... Through this, that person becomes a
'Dragonkind' and gains the power of the dragon..."

14.name: Sol
14.text:
"Ah! So last night... um, you were mating with
that man...!"

15.name: Isk
15.text:
"That is correct... If Sol-sama also had comrades
who fought alongside her... how about lending them
power as Dragonkind...? Surely, it would be their
sustenance and grant them the power to survive..."

17.text: I'll think about it for a bit.

18.name: Sol
18.text: "I'd like to think about it for a bit!!!"

19.name: Isk
19.text:
"If you wish to undergo the ritual... I will be
happy to instruct you. When that time comes,
please call out to me... Sol-sama..."

23.name: Isk
23.text:
"Well then, Sol-sama... Shall we proceed with the
Dragonkind ritual...?"

29.name: Sol
29.text:
"It felt like... the door to a new world has
opened..."

30.name: Isk
30.text:
"By this, the adventurers who serve Sol-sama have
been granted protection... Surely, it will become
an even greater power for Sol-sama..."

31.name: Isk
31.text:
"However... in exchange, it will consume a certain
amount of money and treasures... So please keep
that in mind..."

32.name: Sol
32.text:
"I wish you had told me that important information
earlier if possible!!"

40.text: Scene: Headless Beauty Inn First Request

44.name: Erick
44.text: "Sol-chan, look at this. Can you read it?"

45.name: Sol
45.text:
"I was taught how to read and write in the common
language! ...Um, 'Goblin Extermination'."

46.name: Erick
46.text:
"That's right. It seems like those guys are
lurking on the village's highway. It seems that a
carriage was attacked and destroyed the other
day."

49.name: Adventurer
49.text:
"Those filthy, rotten goblins. They never fail to
cause trouble."

50.name: Adventurer
50.text:
"Good grief, really. And it doesn't even pay well
as a business."

51.name: Adventurer
51.text:
"Those guys are just too much of a pain. Even for
someone who wants to build up achievements, unless
they're really into it, they wouldn't want to do
something like that..."

54.name: Erick
54.text:
"So, I was thinking, how about it for Sol-chan's
debut battle? What do you think? Want to give it a
try?"

55.name: Sol
55.text:
"We can't just leave this alone!! Let's
exterminate them ourselves!! Goblins!!"

56.name: Erick
56.text:
"They're more interested than I thought. ...Okay,
even though they're goblins, we can't afford to
let our guard down! Make sure you're properly
prepared!"
